description: BVMD is a genetic maculopathy caused by a mutation in the BEST1 gene. On OCT it is characterised by pyramid-shaped hyper-reflective material in the sub-retinal space corresponding to the egg yolk-like macular lesions on fundus photographs.
title: Best Vitelliform Macular Dystrophy
